sections.label: Apr: AWS Education Cloud Day
sections.description:
Jasmond Ng, Director of Sales & Business Development at Commontown, was invited to give a short presentation about CommonTown’s educational technology solutions, and the use of Amazon Web Services (AWS) in the Education industry. CommonTown was invited to share about AWS from the perspective of a partner. Other presentations include a sharing by Kaplan Singapore – a user of AWS, and Teamie – a partner of AWS. 

The various presentations gave the audience ample insights into the benefits of using AWS in teaching and learning. It was a good opportunity for us to network and interact with many professionals from the education technology industry.



We would like to extend our thanks to our partner, Amazon Web Services, for giving us the opportunity to be a part of the first ever AWS Education Cloud Day.
